Text.val: ( Service = Graydon, Euler / Hermes, ...)
Author: Juergen Paarmann
24.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
07.02.2008 SH SCR13295 Removed VC handling
28.02.2007 SH SCR12158 Renamed PI.GRAYDON to PI.REQUESTEDFROMSERVICE
12.12.2006 SH SCR12158 Changed PI.GRAYDON into PI.GRAYDON/EH_Request
20.04.2006 SH SCR10858 Removed "Graydon" part; added new parameter
PI.GRAYDON, if 'Y' then the storing of REPA is skipped
10.04.2006 SH SCR10858 Added new part for "Graydon"
on 19.12.2005 WJ SCR9844 change condition
05-11-2003 JP request JP: change first param in call GB002 from "D" to "H"
04-11-2003 JP SCR #4686 skip updates on statistics if called from OMQ052
02-07-2003 JP SCR #3919 submitter note: add init to write variables
02-07-2003 JP SCR #3919 add handling CMIS
21-06-2003 JP SCR #3818 disabled call to BDC111 --> only work with "Auftrag"
06-05-2003 JP SCR #3462 add neww update on REPA_SPECIALDELIVERY
24-04-2003 JP own request: change jobfile-extension from .job(used!) to .vcj
21-03-2003 JP extend request file with requestinformationID
20-03-2003 JP SCR #3103 delete vc connection files after sending/creating temp
05-03-2003 JP disable connection to VC and force creating record in TPCQ
04-03-2003 JP set new param to call BDC111. This indicates that all
requests are handled with the message box program
25-02-2003 JP SCR #3073 change condition to start "Auftrag"
16.05.2002 JJ SCR1281 replaced links GNRD by call UFB533 (win format)
11-06-2002 JP change behavior if called from BDC110 (vc reminder)
15-07-2002 JP change "call BXA019" in "call task to create records BXA019"
-- Update statistics
